name: Get On Time!
description:
Your bus is leaving in exactly one minute! Go as fast as you can.

You can play in 3 different modes: Normal Mode (you have 60 seconds), Hard Mode (you have 30 seconds) and Extreme Mode (you have only 20 seconds!).

Move with  left and right  with your arrows!

Jump with the up arrow.

You can simply push a box by running into it, or pull it with "E".

You can reset the level with "R".

You can pause the game with "Esc"

Almost everything was done for me, except for the music and SFX.

The soundtrack was done by NicoleMarieT. Check the page out!: https://nicolemariet.itch.io/spy-8-bit-16-bit.
